title.rendered: Why Choose Used Auto Parts for Your Next Repair?

content.rendered:
Who doesn’t love a good bargain? You may think that you will have to spend hundreds, if not thousands, when your vehicle needs a part replaced. However, more and more people are turning to used auto parts for repairs and saving a lot of money as a result.
Quality Used Parts
Aero Auto Parts is a Better Business Bureau-accredited parts dealer that sells quality used parts at an affordable price. You may think that since a part is used, it may be of low quality. However, even a vehicle that is totaled in an accident has many parts that are still fully functioning and will last for years. Need a new radiator, transmission, or even a new engine? We have many in stock for an array of makes and models, and ensure all parts are in great working order before offering them to customers. Better yet, you will find all used parts to be at a lower price than any new parts available.
Online Inventory
Our inventory is always growing, and our yard spans over many acres with parts for Nissan, Honda, Toyota, Ford, Mazda, Jeep, Acura, Chevrolet, BMW, Dodge, Lincoln, Volvo, Audi and more makes and models. Before coming by the shop, you may want to check out our online inventory first to make sure we have the specific part you are looking for. Once you find what you need, come by our location in Chicago, and a member of our knowledgeable staff can help you!
For more information about our new, used and wholesale auto parts, call us today at 773-483-2626!
